properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs
properties.Descript_1:
Arrange stone packing-rubble packing-to prevent bank erosion

Vegetative cover improving along the river banks (5m x 10m) with Areca nut seedling in 1.5m x 
1.5m grid, Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed 
seedlings a

properties.Observatio: During the rainy season when too much water flows, Bank erosion occurs. Only the left bank belongs to the GND.
